title: Web Content Scraper Input
description: Configuration for the website to LLM-ready knowledge extractor

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: The URL of the website to crawl. The crawler will stay within this domain.

maxPages.title: Max Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl. Set to a lower number to test or save credits.

maxDepth.title: Max Depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum link depth to crawl from the start URL.

includePaths.title: Include Paths
includePaths.description: Only crawl URLs matching these path patterns (e.g., /docs/*, /blog/*). Leave empty to crawl all paths.

excludePaths.title: Exclude Paths
excludePaths.description: Skip URLs matching these path patterns (e.g., /api/*, /admin/*).

chunkSize.title: Chunk Size (tokens)
chunkSize.description: Target size for content chunks in tokens. Useful for RAG pipelines with token limits.

outputFormat.title: Output Format
outputFormat.description: Choose the output format(s) for extracted content.

enableChunking.title: Enable Chunking
enableChunking.description: When enabled, content is split into RAG-ready chunks. Disable to output only full markdown without chunks.

stripReferences.title: Strip References
stripReferences.description: Remove academic-style footer sections (References, Bibliography, External Links, etc.) from extracted content.

usePlaywright.title: Use Playwright
usePlaywright.description: Force Playwright browser for JavaScript-heavy sites. When disabled, auto-detection is used for known SPA documentation sites.

skipListingPages.title: Skip Listing Pages
skipListingPages.description: Skip low-value listing pages (search results, category pages, archives). These pages typically contain many links but minimal substantive content.
